name: MAZEORANT
description:
MAZEORANT is a beautiful game featuring a short horror maze experience with zombies. Try not to get "shock darted".

Features

  • Timer - I have added a timer so you can beat your own score.
  • Horror - T posing zombies will come out of everywhere. Try not to get scared while escaping the maze.
Controls 
  • WASD - Walk
  • SHIFT (hold) - Run
  • SPACE - Jump, 
  • MOUSE Left Click - Shoot, 
  • MOUSE Right Click - Zoom In (with some weapons)
